body_html:
While upgrading I realized that Rails changed its default serializer for cookies from :marshal to :json (probably already in Rails 5). I didn't do the change to the config/initializers/cookie_serializer.rb file because it will break all existing cookies out there 🙈

I had some bad experience with it
